errors.error_description: The contribution instructions have a logical order error, telling users to fork the repository and start labeling *before* claiming a task in the spreadsheet. This can lead to multiple people working on the same image.
correction_candidates: Move the step "Visit the Google Spreadsheet..." to be step 1, before forking and labeling.
Combine the forking and spreadsheet steps into a single step.
Add a note before step 1 saying "Important: Make sure to check the spreadsheet first to see if an image is already being worked on."
Remove the step about the Google Spreadsheet entirely and tell users to coordinate on Discord.
errors.golden_answer: Move the step "Visit the Google Spreadsheet..." to be step 1, before forking and labeling.
